member.name: T:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.AuditLogsController
member.summary: API controller demonstrating daily-sharded audit log queries.

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.AuditLogsController.GetLogsForDay(System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get audit logs for a specific day (single shard, most efficient).

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.AuditLogsController.GetRecentLogs(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get recent audit logs (today, queries hot shard).

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.AuditLogsController.SearchLogs(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Search audit logs across a date range.

member.name: T:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.MetricsController
member.summary: API controller demonstrating hourly-sharded metrics queries. Hourly sharding is ideal for high-volume time-series data.

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.MetricsController.GetMetricsForHour(System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get metrics for a specific hour (single shard, most efficient).

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.MetricsController.GetAggregatedMetrics(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get aggregated metrics over a time range.

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.MetricsController.GetLatestMetrics(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get latest metrics (queries recent hourly shards).

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.MetricsController.BatchIngestMetrics(Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.BatchIngestRequest)
member.summary: Batch ingest metrics (routes to appropriate hourly shards).

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.MetricsController.CreateMetric(Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.CreateMetricRequest)
member.summary: Create a single metric data point.

member.name: T:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.TransactionsController
member.summary: API controller demonstrating date-based sharding queries. Shows efficient time-range queries that target specific shards.

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.TransactionsController.GetTransactions(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String,System.Nullable{Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.TransactionType},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get transactions for a date range. DTDE automatically routes to the relevant monthly shards.

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.TransactionsController.GetTransactionsByMonth(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Get transactions for a specific month (single shard query). Most efficient query as it targets exactly one shard.

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.TransactionsController.GetStatement(System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get account statement for a period.

member.name: M:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.TransactionsController.CreateTransaction(Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Controllers.CreateTransactionRequest)
member.summary: Create a new transaction. DTDE routes to the correct monthly shard based on TransactionDate.

member.name: T:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Data.DateShardingDbContext
member.summary:
DbContext demonstrating date-based sharding.
Entities are partitioned by date: - Transactions: Monthly partitions (Transactions_2024_01, etc.) - AuditLogs: Daily partitions (AuditLogs_2024_01_15, etc.) - Metrics: Quarterly partitions for longer retention

member.name: T:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.AuditLog
member.summary: Audit log entity sharded by timestamp. Uses daily partitioning for high-volume logging scenarios.

member.name: P:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.AuditLog.Timestamp
member.summary: Timestamp - SHARD KEY. Used to route to daily tables.

member.name: T:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.MetricDataPoint
member.summary: Metric data point sharded by timestamp. Uses hourly partitioning for time-series metrics.

member.name: P:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.MetricDataPoint.Timestamp
member.summary: Timestamp - SHARD KEY. Used to route to time-based partitions.

member.name: T:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.Transaction
member.summary: Transaction entity sharded by TransactionDate. Data is partitioned by month for efficient time-range queries.

member.name: P:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.Transaction.TransactionDate
member.summary: Transaction date - SHARD KEY. Used to determine which monthly table stores this transaction.

member.name: P:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.Transaction.Amount
member.summary: Transaction amount (positive for credits, negative for debits).

member.name: P:Dtde.Samples.DateSharding.Entities.Transaction.CreatedAt
member.summary: When the transaction was created in the system.
